name: Raining Men!
description:
Made for the GMTK Jame 2021 which had the theme Joined Together.

Use your mouse to join items together to save as many falling men as possible!

Credits

Font: Poetsen One by Rodrigo Fuenzalida

CC-29 colour palette by Alpha6

Your Call by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5018-your-call 

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Funk guitar samples by Timbre on freesound
